ZDO_SystemServerDiscoveryReq_t Struct Reference

This request is generated from a Local Device wishing to discover the location of a particular system server or servers as indicated by the ServerMask parameter. The destination addressing on this request is broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle = TRUE. More...

#include <zdo.h>


Data Fields

uint16_t serverMask
 Server mask field of the node descriptor.

Detailed Description

This request is generated from a Local Device wishing to discover the location of a particular system server or servers as indicated by the ServerMask parameter. The destination addressing on this request is broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle = TRUE.

Definition at line 542 of file zdo.h.
